name: Firefox 4 Lock Icon for Secure Sites
description:
Adds a lock icon for secure sites which pass verification.
Tested in Firefox 4 Minefield on Windows 7. It is unknown to me if it will work on any other configuration.

02.01.11 - Updated to show in addition to, rather than replace, the favicon; updated screenshot
12.2.10 - Confirmed working in Vista by user 66689 - thanks!
11.24.10 - Confirmed working on Mac by user 12849 - thanks!
